alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 10:58PM EDT until further notice by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina...South Carolina... Northeast Cape Fear River Near Burgaw affecting Pender County. Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County. Lumber River 1 SE Nichols affecting Horry, Dillon and Marion Counties. Lynches River At Effingham affecting Florence County. For the Northeast Cape Fear River...including Burgaw...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Lumber River...including Nichols, Pembroke, Lumberton Usgs Gage, Maxton, Lumberton, Boardman...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Lynches River...including Effingham...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lumber River 1 se Nichols. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Flooding worsens along River Road and begins along Drowning Creek Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday afternoon and continue rising to 21.1 feet Monday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by Thursday afternoon.
